title: Former Embassy of Iran in Washington D.C.

title_detail.value: Former Embassy of Iran in Washington D.C.

author: Mehrdad
summary: The Former Embassy of Iran in Washington, D.C. is located at 3003-3005 Massachusetts Avenue, in Washington, D.C.’s Embassy Row neighbourhood. Withdrawn, silent, and inaccessible it has been closed since the fall of the Shah, and the US embassy hostage crisis of 1979.
